name: Color Jump! -- The most difficult in the history！
name_original: Color Jump! -- The most difficult in the history！
description:
Color Jump! -- The most difficult in the history！

Each level, is a new challenge!
Do you believe in yourself? Come On!
If you not believe in yourself, please leave!

Life is like a colorful color,we should become stronger,
No matter how difficult the fight, we believe in ourselves!
Come on friends you are best!
Let the color of life full jump up!
Each jump is a beautiful note!
Failure is not terrible,
We must have the courage to face the challenges!
I believe, the outcome must be beautiful!

Bless those who always challenge themselves, never give up!
